content: How can I print the next year from the current year in Python, preferably in one line using the datetime module?

You can print the next year from the current year in Python using the `datetime` module in one line like this:

```python
import datetime
print(datetime.datetime.now().year + 1)
```

This code gets the current year using `datetime.datetime.now().year` and adds 1 to it to get the next year.
